item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Failure.FailureCount.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the active directory replication failure count

item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Failure.FailureType.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the active directory replication failure type

item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Failure.LastError.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the active directory replication last error

item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Failure.FirstFailureTime.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the active directory replication parameter "FirstFailureTime"

item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Partner.Metadata.LRAttempt.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the last replication attempt time

item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Partner.Metadata.LRSuccess.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the last replication success time

item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Partner.Metadata.CRF.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the consecutive replication failures

item_prototype.name: ADReplication.Partner.Metadata.LRResult.partner:{#PARTNER}
item_prototype.description: Item shows the last replication result
